entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bella Bella
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:15 PM PST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 8.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bella Bella Airport 1:00 PM PST Friday 10 March 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: 8.1°C
Pressure: 99.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 32 %
Dewpoint: -7.7°C
Wind: ENE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind light except northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 through mainland inlets and valleys near noon. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except northeast 40 through mainland inlets and valleys overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. A few showers beginning in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except northeast 50 gusting to 70 through mainland inlets and valleys. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 10 March 2023
